original_name: Bret Michaels and the Zombie Apocalypse of Love
plot: After the Zombie Apocalypse, only one TV has survived. One where hot zombies compete to eat the brain of Bret Michaels.
plot_en: After the Zombie Apocalypse, only one TV has survived. One where hot zombies compete to eat the brain of Bret Michaels.
plot_es: After the Zombie Apocalypse, only one TV has survived. One where hot zombies compete to eat the brain of Bret Michaels.
title: Bret Michaels and the Zombie Apocalypse of Love
